summary: In an old house in Hanoi, Bi, a 6-year-old child lives with his parents, his aunt and their cook. His favorite playgrounds are an ice factory and the wild grass along the river. After being... See full summary »
cast: Thanh Minh Phan|Thi Kieu Trinh Nguyen|Ha Phong Nguyen|Thuy Hoa|Tran Tien|Mai Chau|Phuong Thao Hoang|Huynh Anh Lê|Kim Long Thach|Hoang Ha Pham|Tuan Anh Hoang
title: Bi, dung so!
